name: P&C Survival
description:
Prototype realised during the GODOT WildJam #2

(linux and mac version could'nt be tested)

How to play :

- Click on move to change place

- Click the middle of the screen to "search" the place where you are

- Maintain Click + mouse up or down rotate your inventory

- Click on an items in your inventory to do some action with it

Your Goal :

- Avoid monsters that lurk on you

- Keep your Health, Stamina, and Sanity in check

- Find a wire, a vacuum lamp, an antenna, and a mic (escape item)

- Find the broken radio (Mine or Mansion)

- use the escape item find previously on the radio

Note :

Due to time constraint the radio could be a little tedious to find and you better have to find a torch light before the night comes (2 min night-day cycles)
